value:
Dancing is embarrassing enough, but
dancing up in the sky is just plain
dangerous! One mistake and I'll fall!

I've ridden in a wagon, of course, and
on horseback. But never did I think
I'd ride something that can fly!$k$pAnd I especially didn't imagine I'd be
dancing all the way up there...

Let me know if you start to feel worn
out, OK? I'd be so glad if I could raise
your spirits with a dance!

Oh, I was just giving my friend here a
much-needed brushing. Judging by
his reaction, he really likes it!

I just got back from the market. I
found a ton of fruits and vegetables
that I know falicorns just love!

Allow me to introduce myself. I'm
Olivia, a dancer with Chrom's
Shepherds.$k$pI've been entrusted with a letter to
you from $Nf.

I feel like I'm flying all on my own!
Is this what it means to be one
with your steed?

My partner and I became fast
friends. He's such a good boy!

Hey, whoa! Stop! Listen to me!
No, you're going the wrong way!

Thank you! I promise I'll use this
to soar to even grander heights!

My name is Olivia, and from atop my
falicorn I'll— Eek! W-wait, don't take
off so suddenly! Please land!

O-oh! Were you watching me dance?
Well, yes, you have a good eye... It is
a brand-new dance I'm working on.$k$pBut please don't tell anyone about it!
It's not ready for an audience yet, so
promise me. OK?$k$pI thought I could make my dances
much more expressive by making
better use of the sky and my falicorn.$k$pFlying through the sky on his back for
the first time was such a moving
experience for me.$k$pThe sound of cutting through the
wind, the color of the sky, the brisk
air all around me...$k$pI want to convey all of those things
through my dancing!$k$pMy hope is to give people who have
never flown before a sense of how
amazing it is.$k$pI've been trying a lot of new moves,
but it isn't going as well as I had
hoped.$k$pI've taken my fair share of tumbles
lately...$k$pBut when this new dance is finally
ready, I want you to be the first
person who sees it!
それっ！
えーいっ
きゃああっ！
そんなあ…！
Please don't watch!
Eeeee-AAAHH!!
I've got a dance partner now!
This is too high up!
I'm...falling...
Well...
I never know what to do!
A gift from above!
This is all so new to me. I'm used to dancing on a stage...on the ground...
Oh! It's you! You, um... Y-you haven't been watching me practice, have you?
The sky makes for a much higher stage than I'm used to... It gets my heart pounding.
I've been practicing a dance with my new partner.
If you'd like, I can arrange for you to watch my dance from a special seat atop another—oh! Oh, never mind, it's too embarrassing!
We dance!
What's next?
The sky is my stage!
